text:
[Verse]
Sunflowers in the breeze
Dancing with the trees
Golden rays of light
Everything feels right

[Verse 2]
Walking down the lane
Skipping in the rain
Dreams that never end
With you my friend

[Chorus]
Sunflower dreams
Nothing what it seems
Smile and shine so bright
Day turns into night

[Verse 3]
Fields of green so wide
You standing by my side
Heartbeats in the air
We got time to spare

[Bridge]
Nothing can compare
Moments that we share
In this endless bloom
Erase all the gloom

[Chorus]
Sunflower dreams
Nothing what it seems
Smile and shine so bright
Day turns into night
title: Sunflower Dreams
